hero.subtitle: Creating a New Sea for the Future
hero.description: Based on the promotion of marine industries, we contribute to the revitalization of Japan's coastal regions through diversified business development beyond the framework of fisheries. By leveraging unique technologies and partnerships with fisheries cooperatives nationwide, we realize the sustainable use of marine resources.

marine.title: Marine Business
marine.description: Diversified business development beyond the framework of fisheries. Developing innovative marine tourism through experiential fishing tourism, mobile hotels/RV parks, and partnerships with JTB Research.

seaweed.title: Seaweed Cultivation
seaweed.description: "The Earth's First Plant" â€” innovative cultivation technology by Mother Vegetables and MV Factory. With next-generation modules that grow 30 times faster, expanding into food, beauty, environment, and industry fields.

items.approval: Approved by Fisheries Agency / International Collaboration
